hooks.command: if echo "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" | grep -q 'plans/.*\.md'; then echo 'ACTION REQUIRED: Plan file written. Run verify-plan-criteria to validate acceptance criteria coverage before proceeding.'; fi

echo 'SPEC-DRIVEN DEVELOPMENT ACTIVE: (1) Every task in an implementation plan MUST include **Acceptance Criteria:** with machine-verifiable - [ ] items. After writing a plan, run verify-plan-criteria. (2) Before claiming any task is complete, run verify-acceptance-criteria to mechanically check all criteria against the codebase.'

hooks.prompt:
You are a gate-check that outputs ONLY a single word or a single BLOCK line. No other text.

Check the conversation for BOTH conditions:
A) The assistant used Edit/Write tools to implement code from a plan that has acceptance criteria (- [ ] items)
B) The verify-acceptance-criteria skill was NOT invoked

If BOTH A and B are true, output exactly:
BLOCK: Run verify-acceptance-criteria before ending this session.

Otherwise output exactly:
pass
